startup-information: Denis Cache Based Database Language, All rights reserved.
Please install Denis CLI to manage the database.
startup-swd: Denis started in detailed mode, use 'denis --opt -swd f' command to turn off detail mode.
denis-global-logger: Delogg (Denis Logg) mode enabled. All operations by server and client are saved to 'logs/' folder.
help: > Denis Cache and Protobuf Based Database Language
--lm: Monitor DenisDB's memory usage in process structure.
--opt: Quickly changes DenisDB's settings and user preferences.
-slfs: <tr,en> Changes language only for active session.
-slfg: <tr,en> Makes a permanent language change for all sessions.
-smts: <Number> Sets maximum amount of tokens (data sections) that can be created.
-ctea: <t/f> Enables/disables new token system for selected token on each entry.
-umte: <t/f> Enables/disables general token system. (Note: When this option is enabled, all projects can be accessed with main token.)
All changes made here can also be done manually, operations are saved to denis.properties file.
